Introduction
============

``workplace_perator`` is a workplace notifier for group using warbot ``warung pintar bot`` (see `here <https://medium.com/warung-pintar/notifikasi-airflow-melalui-workplace-cb1505169241/>`_)

The aim here was to easy handy determined task in airflow whether it's error or success.

Motivation

Keep learning and build more good.
